Package main.controllers

Class TransactionsController

java.lang.Object
main.controllers.Controller
main.controllers.TransactionsController
public class TransactionsController extends Controller
This class manages user actions pertaining to the sale of movie tickets. A list of movie-goers and a map of movies to ticket sales is stored in this class.
Since:
2022-11-08
Version:
1.0
Author:
Tai Chen An

  • Method Details

    • makePayment

      public static void makePayment(main.models.Session session, List<String> bookedSeats, main.models.MovieGoer movieGoer, double price)
      This method is called when movie-goer makes a successful transaction. A new Transaction is created with the given fields and stored in the given movieGoer. The number of ticket sales for the movie in the given session is incremented.
      Parameters:
      session - session where tickets were booked
      bookedSeats - list of booked seats
      movieGoer - movie-goer who booked seats
      price - total price of all tickets.

    • getMovieGoer

      public static main.models.MovieGoer getMovieGoer(String email)
      Searches the list of movie-goers for one that matches the given email address.
      Parameters:
      email - email address of movie-goer
      Returns:
      MovieGoer with the given email address

    • addMovieGoer

      public static void addMovieGoer(main.models.MovieGoer movieGoer)
      Adds the given movie-goer to the stored list of movie-goers.
      Parameters:
      movieGoer - movie-goer to be added to the list of movie-goers

    • getTicketSales

      public static int getTicketSales(main.models.Movie movie)
      Parameters:
      movie - movie to get ticket sales for
      Returns:
      number of ticket sales for the given movie

    • addTicketSales

      public static void addTicketSales(main.models.Movie movie, int numTickets)
      Increments the number of ticket sales for the given movie by the given number of tickets.
      Parameters:
      movie - movie to increment number of ticket sales
      numTickets - number of sales

    • loadMovieGoers

      public static void loadMovieGoers()
      Deserialises the list of movie-goers.
